from"axios";import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,Tooltip,Legend,ResponsiveContainer,CartesianGrid}from"recharts";import"./Dados_meteo.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DadosMeteo=()=>{const[dados,setDados]=useState({});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[range,setRange]=useState("-6h");useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/clima/aggregated?range=".concat(range));setDados(res.data.data||{});}catch(error){console.error("Erro ao buscar dados:",error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[range]);const renderChart=(field,cor)=>{const chartData=(dados[field]||[]).map(item=>({time:new horas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"-24h",children:"\xDAltimas 24 horas"})]})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"loading-text",children:"Carregando
